311920.name: Fantasy Grounds - PFRPG Compatible Adventure: Cipactli's Maw - One on One Adventure #15
311920.description:
Cipactli's Maw

1 on 1 Adventures #15

Welcome to 1 on 1 Adventures, action-packed scenarios designed for 1 player and
1 GM.
1 on 1 Adventures #15: Cipactli's Maw is designed for a Wizard, level 4-6, powered by Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. The Wizards of the Four Winds have enlisted the PC to find the legendary vault of the great Queen Huehaatl hidden deep in the jungle.
If you enjoy this adventure, check out the One on One Adventures Compendium containing the first eleven adventures in the line compiled and updated for Pathfinder and look for future releases in the 1 on 1 Adventure line from Expeditious Retreat Press.
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual tabletop. The adventure module has been carefully organized to streamline gameplay and includes, story elements, personalities, items, vehicles (if necessary) and images. These can be modified within your Fantasy Grounds campaign as needed.
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Cari Harper
Requirements: A Full or Ultimate license of Fantasy Grounds and the PFRPG (or compatible) ruleset.
This is an Pathfinder Roleplaying Compatible game product.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Cari Harper
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder RPG and D&D 3.5/ OGL ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
